title: Oz: A Rock 'n' Roll Road Movie
creator_credit: Chris Lofven, Lyne Helms and Count Features
brief_description: An Australian rock movie fable. Dorothy’s teenage quest in the Australia of the 70’s is a modern parable set to Ross Wilson’s music. With three weird friends who alternate between being pals and making passes, Dorothy sets out to find the answer to fame and fortune’s riddle at the hands of the wonderful wizard.
